ygData.subject: RE: Nagafen Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Same thing has happened to me, my brother and several friends. We all submitted /bug reports about it, and that was the last we ever heard of the problem.
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Jean-Christian Sokol <jcsokol@...>
>
> From: Douglas Babcock [SMTP:dbabcock@...]
>
> >Heres the problem we encountered and I need to know If anyone else
>has seen
> >this.
>
> >3 of our casters, 2 clerics and 1 enchanter lost the ability to
>cast spells
> >during the melee.
>
> I was playing with a friend yesterday, in Befallen too, and at one
>time my keyboard went out. I hit the hotkeys but NOTHING happened. I could
>talk, but couldn't <i>nventory, <a>ttack, etc. I had to /exit. And then
>log
>again.
>
> Saoryn, Wiz 15, Tunare.

Same thing has happened to me, my brother and several friends. We all
submitted /bug reports about it, and that was the last we ever heard of the
problem. It still continues to happen though.

We all play on Bertoxxulous.
